value.title: You Can Now Pay for Ride Fares in the Moscow Subway With Your Face
value.excerpt: As of this week, you can even pay for subway fares with your face. Before you ask where you can sign up, this new facial recognition payment system has debuted in Russia, sparking concerns that it will be used by authorities as a surveillance tool.

value.title: Facial recognition cameras arrive in UK school canteens
value.excerpt: Facial recognition computers have found an unlikely new niche: scanning the faces of thousands of British pupils in school canteens. On Monday, nine schools in North Ayrshire will start taking payments for school lunches by scanning the faces of pupils,

value.title: NALSAR, CHSS to empower security agencies with AI course

The 3-day Executive Certificate Program (ECP) to All India Police Departments and Central Paramilitary Forces (CISF-CRPF-SSB-ITBP-BSF) and other important law enforcement agencies in the country.
